name: Unlinked
description:
Unlinked is a 3D, third-person, action-puzzle game, where you play as someone whose body has been stolen. Now a bodiless spirit, the only way to progress is by linking yourself to other humans, possessing them with limited control. Can you find the rogue spirit who stole your body, and reclaim it?

Note: This is a proof of concept prototype, with the sole purpose of transmitting the core game loop.

Controls:
  • WASD, Arrows - Move
  • Space Bar - Link/Unlink
  • Mouse Left, Tab - Melee attack
  • Mouse Right, Left Shift - Dash
  • Escape - Pause
Developed by:
  • Afonso Lage - Game Designer
  • André Santos - Programmer
  • Nelson Milheiro - Sound Designer, Voices

[2021, Lusofona University, second-year Videogames Bachelor students]
